content: amish baskets crochet quilt when i originally designed this crochet quilt red heart was still making their burgundy fiesta yarn why they quit making it i haven t a clue it was a drop dead gorgeous yarn i would suggest you substitute the burgundy fiesta for a solid color or maybe a nice ombre abbreviations beg - beginning chain - chain slip_stitch - slip_stitch space - space double_crochet - double_crochet single_crochet - single_crochet blo - back loop only note this afghan is worked using worsted weight yarn in the colors specified with each project it is made up of two different types of granny squares a solid color granny and a bi-color granny general directions for each are as follows below simply crochet the number of squares needed for each block in the color required then assemble as described in instructions solid color granny finished square measures approximately 2 1/2 chain 4 join with a slip_stitch to first chain to form a ring round 1 chain 3 2 double_crochet in ring chain 1 3 double_crochet in ring chain 1 three times join with slip_stitch to top of beg chain 3 round 2 chain 3 turn 2 double_crochet in first chain 1 space chain 1 3 bi-color granny finished square measures approximately 2 1/2 chain 4 with main color join with a slip_stitch to first chain to form a ring round 1 chain 3 2 double_crochet in ring chain 1 3
